author: michael.hicks@futurenet.com (Michael L Hicks)
title: In 2023, smartwatches tried to become fitness watches and vice versa
description: Google, Apple, and Samsung all tried to brew the perfect mix of smarts, health tracking, and fitness tools, while dedicated fitness brands tried to add mainstream smarts.
content:
(Image credit: Android Central)
